website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight helmet, but it offers a high level of protection for the batter.
pros: Helmet’s interior has a moisture wicking padding to keep the player feeling cooler for the entire game
More than 20 air vents help with airflow beneath the helmet
Ships with a face mask, which saves you some money in the long run
Multiple colors available, so you can match your uniform color
cons: Finding just the right size for a snug fit is challenging for some players

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you RIP-IT for sizing helmets for ALL sizes of kids! My daughter wears a T-Ball sized helmet, but is in 10U fastpitch. The variety of sizes you offer allows her to be safe and also a chance to see out of her helmet! Perfect solution for kids with a smaller head!
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! My 8 year old need a helmet with a guard for fast pitch softball problem was she apparently has a tiny head so we couldn't find one anywhere until we tried this in XS. Finally we have a good fit and she can now bat safely! NOTE: I wouldn't get this for an 8 year old unless you've had the same problem as me. This is better for a 5-6 year old but like I said she has a tiny head.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Marie

customer_reviews.title: High quality, firm fit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic line of sight! The fit is very tight due to the padding. My daughter has a big head and this is the largest helmet I could find. I think even a smaller head would be securely swaddled in this helmet. The padding is high quality. There is no weird jiggly movement.
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She had earned over 30 helmet stickers on her old helmet and it was getting old and ragged. I ordered her this helmet and she was reluctant at first but once she put this helmet on her head and felt how lightweight it was she told me I could take her old helmet to the dump and throw it away. She even rode with me in my truck to the dump. This new helmet now has many many helmet stickers on it as well and I could not be happier... And neither can she! Well worth the money, best helmet out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Warlick Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Well made helmet, good protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought small/medium. Fit my 9 year old daughter who is on the petite side. She wears size 8 clothes for the most part, and is about 55 pounds. The extra small probably would have fit her, too, but the coach gave this one the thumbs up. It is a good looking helmet with ample padding and good face protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Catherine Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Batting Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This batting helmet works great for my daughter! She has a bigger head and it fit her great. Love the colors and they were just as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a royal blue and black helmet and when I opened the box it was white and blue with some stripes. I’m not able to return it because I have a game this week and won’t get a new one in time. The helmet looks pretty ok, but i’m a little upset because all the pictures are black and blue and nothing like the one I received. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Christian Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Equipment & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Happy with colors, comfort, and durability. Purchased them for the team!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes the color
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my daughter for her fastpitch softball season!
customer_reviews.author: julie hunter

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase a batting helmet to play with the team I just joined. I am not used to wearing one but this is comfortable. I love the color and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Super comfortable and looks great on the field. Provides ultimate protection while fitting all my players perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: No better helmet
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet in out on the market. It comes is bright colors and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only downfall is the XS is a bit too tight and this one is a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight Helmet
customer_reviews.text: my 11 year old daughter loves this helmet. It is very light, much lighter than all the other helmets with face guards. it fits snug enough that it does not move around as she is running the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Bdub

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great quality, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, great quality, comfortable, held up very well all season and still looks pretty new. This should last many more years for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! Went to our local sporting store to figure out what size our daughter needed- then ordered here for better color selection. She loves it and loves the fit much better than other brands
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: The blue is very pretty. It fits her 10 year old head perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it! The blue is very pretty. It fits her 10 year old head perfectly. I hope to get a couple years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! The extra small fit my smaller than normal 8 year old perfect. I will probably stick with this brand helmet from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Kool
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmets, fit perfecectly for our 12u team!! But SELLER, try using a different courier, they were late on delivering!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 and loves the helmet and it fits great. It should last her several years.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cool helmet
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it... It's a cool color...not all the kids have the same helmet in the recreational league so it's easy spot your kid, when up at bat from far away
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Extra large size is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. I bought extra large to fit her head with a pony tail. Helmet is good and does not slide or wiggle when she’s batting.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy the smaller size, but it is a great helmet!
customer_reviews.author: hooksj15

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves this helmet! She finds it very easy to put on and take off as well as comfortable to wear. We measured her head circumference and found that this helmet is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan P. Morang

customer_reviews.title: Love Rip-it Products
customer_reviews.text: Rip-it has never let me know I used them and now my 6 year old niece is using them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fire fighter

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 11 years old, and this helmet is FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: The Accountant

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my daughter's head
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! Great protection for my daughter's head.
customer_reviews.author: KrisBarn

customer_reviews.title: Pony tail track smart idea!
customer_reviews.text: Fit a small head very well. Colors true. Pony tail track smart idea!
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: We took a big chance ordering without trying on! Fit perfectly according to size chart! Very satisfied!!! And speedy shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and it appears it will last through many years of softball.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this helmet! Super cute and great for big heads.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the helmet, her friends want one also.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this helmet. Quck shipping. Excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great Helmet. My daughter loves it. very comfortable and she loves the visibility it allows her to have.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. It looks great and does a good job .
customer_reviews.author: patricia kulak

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light helmet fit good on my daughter very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Hector sanchez

product_meta.title: RIP-IT Vision Pro Away Softball Batting Helmet
product_meta.description: Constructed from a lightweight shell, this RIP-IT® Vision Pro away softball batting helmet promises exceptional comfort so you can focus on your game. Blackout Technology helps prevent glare, and moisture-managing pads work with 21 strategically placed air vents to keep you totally cool under pressure.
feature_bullets: RIP-IT VISION PRO –With our revolutionary dual-density foam, this helmet boasts superior protection and comfort in an ultra-lightweight package. The Vision Pro provides you with an uninhibited field of vision.

SEE MORE, DO MORE – The RIP-IT Vision Pro features Blackout Technology, which is like eye-black for your equipment, only better. This helps eliminate glare from the sun and will help you see the ball like never before.

LOADED WITH FEATURES – Engineered with dual density foam, this helmet exceeds NOSCAE Standards. The Vision Pro also comes with moisture-management wrapped pads, which wick away sweat, as well as 21 strategically placed air vents.

RIP-IT DEFENSE QUALITY – At RIP-IT, we understand that team sports are an integral part of confidence building and help provide girls with the skills they need to be successful. We make quality products that honor this commitment.
PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS – Package includes (1) RIP-IT Vision Pro Softball Away Color Helmet with Face Guard.
